### Vector attribute joining

Join by attribute...

```{python}
import pandas as pd
```

```{python}
coffee_data = pd.read_csv("data/coffee_data.csv")
coffee_data
```

Join by `"name_long"` column...

```{python}
world_coffee = pd.merge(world, coffee_data, on = "name_long", how = "left")
world_coffee
```

Plot... The `missing_kwds` argument is specified to control appearance of features with missing data. Otherwise, countries with no coffee data are not plotted.

```{python}
world_coffee.plot(column = "coffee_production_2017", missing_kwds = {"color": "white", "edgecolor": "lightgrey"})
```

```{python}
base = world.plot(color = "white", edgecolor = "lightgrey")
world_coffee.plot(ax = base, column = "coffee_production_2017")
```
